Job Description: Ascend on Engineering is excited to announce that they are expanding their specialist Engineering teams in Bangalore. These teams are responsible for delivering new features from scratch for the company\u2019s cloud based digital BSS Ascend on Platform. An exciting opportunity currently exists for a Senior Software Development Engineer with extensive product development experience to join their growing Engineering team..    About the role     As a Sr Software Development Engineer in Ascend on RD, you will have the opportunity to work with an experienced team developing solutions for Ascend on platform.    You will work collaboratively with other the company delivery teams in Chicago, Bangalore, and Brisbane.    You will leverage industry best practices and methodologies such as Agile, Scrum, SAFe and DevOps.
